participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

irma_gatea_p.Description: Were you and your child living in Florida at the time that Hurricane Irma hit the United States (September 2017)? ¿Estaban usted y su hijo(a)  viviendo en Florida  en el momento en que el huracán Irma llegA a los Estados Unidos (Septiembre de 2017)? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_gateb_p.Description: Were you and your child living in South Carolina at the time that Hurricane Irma hit the United States (September 2017)?  ¿Estaban usted y su hijo(a)  viviendo en la Carolina del Sur  en el momento en que el huracán Irma llegA a los Estados Unidos (Septiembre de 2017)? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b1a.Description: Did your child leave (evacuate) your home for the hurricane? ¿Su hijo(a) dejo (evacuo) su hogar por el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b1b.Description: Did you leave (evacuate) your home for the hurricane? ¿Usted dejo (evacuo) su hogar por el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b1c.Description: Were you with your child during the evacuation? Estabas con tu hijo(a) durante la evacuaciAn? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b2.Description: When your child evacuated your home, where did he or she go?   ¿Cuando tu hijo(a) evacuA de su casa, a dAnde fue? | 1 = To a friend or relative's home nearby (less than an hour away)  Para la casa de un amigo o familiar cercano (a menos de una hora de distancia); 2 = To a shelter nearby (less than an hour away)  A un refugio cercano (a menos de una hora de distancia); 3 = To another place in the state A otro lugar en el estado; 4 = Left the state Salió del estado

Levels.1: To a friend or relative's home nearby (less than an hour away)  Para la casa de un amigo o familiar cercano (a menos de una hora de distancia)
Levels.2: To a shelter nearby (less than an hour away)  A un refugio cercano (a menos de una hora de distancia)
Levels.3: To another place in the state A otro lugar en el estado
Levels.4: Left the state Salió del estado

irma_hurtep_b3.Description: When your child evacuated, how long was he or she away from your home? Cuando tu hijo(a) evacuA, ¿cuánto tiempo estuvo lejos de su casa? | 1 = Less than a day  Menos de un día; 2 = 1-2 days  1-2 días; 3 = 3-6 days  3-6 día; 4 = A week or more Una semana o más

Levels.1: Less than a day  Menos de un día
Levels.4: A week or more Una semana o más

irma_hurtep_b4.Description: When your child evacuated, did he or she stay in more than one place during the evacuation? Cuando tu hijo evacuA, ¿se quedA en más de un lugar durante la evacuaciAn? | 0 = No  No; 1 = Yes; 2 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b5.Description: How many hours in total did your child spend traveling before the hurricane? ¿Cuántas horas en total paso tu hijo viajando antes del huracán? | 1 = Under 2 hours  Menos de 2 horas; 2 = 2-5 hours  2-5 horas; 3 = 5-10 hours  5-10 horas; 4 = More than 10 hours total Más de 10 horas en total

Levels.4: More than 10 hours total Más de 10 horas en total

irma_hurtep_b6.Description: How many hours in total did your child spend traveling to get back home after the hurricane? ¿Cuántas horas en total paso tu hijo(a) viajando para regresar a su casa después del huracán? | 1 = Under 2 hours  Menos de 2 horas; 2 = 2-5 hours  2-5 horas; 3 = 5-10 hours  5-10 horas; 4 = More than 10 hours total Más de 10 horas en total

Levels.4: More than 10 hours total Más de 10 horas en total

irma_hurtep_b7___1.Description: How did you get news of information about Hurricane Irma? Check all that apply. ¿CAmo obtuvo noticias de informaciAn sobre el huracán? Marque todo lo que corresponda. (1, TV (e.g.,  weather channel,  news reports)  TV (e.g.,  Canal de clima,  reportes de noticia)) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b7___2.Description: How did you get news of information about Hurricane Irma? Check all that apply. ¿CAmo obtuvo noticias de informaciAn sobre el huracán? Marque todo lo que corresponda. (2, Internet (e.g.,  online news)  Internet (e.g.,  noticias del internet)) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b7___3.Description: How did you get news of information about Hurricane Irma? Check all that apply. ¿CAmo obtuvo noticias de informaciAn sobre el huracán? Marque todo lo que corresponda. (3, Social media (e.g.,  Facebook,  Twitter,  Instagram)  Medios de ComunicaciAn social (e.g.,  Facebook,  Twitter,  Instagram)) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b7___4.Description: How did you get news of information about Hurricane Irma? Check all that apply. ¿CAmo obtuvo noticias de informaciAn sobre el huracán? Marque todo lo que corresponda. (4, From family and friends  De familia y amigos) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b7___5.Description: How did you get news of information about Hurricane Irma? Check all that apply. ¿CAmo obtuvo noticias de informaciAn sobre el huracán? Marque todo lo que corresponda. (5, Other  Otro) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b7___6.Description: How did you get news of information about Hurricane Irma? Check all that apply. ¿CAmo obtuvo noticias de informaciAn sobre el huracán? Marque todo lo que corresponda. (6, I did not get news or information about Hurricane Irma No recibí noticias o informaciAn sobre el huracán Irma) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_b8.Description: How often did you check reports about the hurricane in the days before the storm? ¿Con qué frecuencia revisA los reportes sobre el huracán en los días antes de la tormenta? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b9.Description: Overall, how scared or upset were you before the hurricane? En general, ¿qué tan asustado o enojado estaba usted antes del huracán? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b10.Description: Overall, how scared or upset do you think your child was before the hurricane? En general, ¿qué tan asustado o molesto estaba su hijo(a) antes del huracán? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b11.Description: Overall, how stressed did you feel before the hurricane? En general, ¿cuán estresado se sintiA antes del huracán? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b12.Description: Overall, how stressed do you think your child felt before the hurricane? En general, ¿que tan estresado se sintiA su hijo(a) antes del huracán? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b13.Description: Overall, how safe did you feel before the hurricane? En general, ¿qué tan seguro se sintiA antes del huracán? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b14.Description: Overall, how safe do you think your child felt before the hurricane? En general, ¿qué tan seguro se sintiA su hijo(a) antes del huracán? | 0 = Not at all  De ningun modo; 1 = A little  Un poco; 2 = A lot  Mucho; 3 = A whole lot Muchisimo

Levels.0: Not at all  De ningun modo

irma_hurtep_b15.Description: At any time before the hurricane, did you think you might die? En cualquier momento antes del huracán, ¿crees que podrías morir? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b16.Description: At any time before the hurricane, did you think that a family member might be hurt badly? En cualquier momento antes del huracán, ¿crees que tú o un miembro de tu familia podrían estar lastimados? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b17.Description: At any time before the hurricane, did you think that the hurricane might cause major damage to your home, or that you might lose your home En cualquier momento antes del huracán, ¿pensA que el huracán podría causar un daño mayor a su hogar, o que podría perder su hogar? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_b18.Description: If another severe weather event, such as a hurricane, was predicted to strike where you live, would you stay in your home or evacuate?  Si se pronostica que otro huracán golpea donde usted vive, ¿preferiría quedarse en su casa o evacuar? | 1 = Definitely Stay at Home  Definitivamente quedarme en casa; 2 = Probably Stay at Home  Probablemente quedarme en casa; 3 = Unsure  Inseguro; 4 = Probably Leave (evacuate)  Probablemente salir (evacuar); 5 = Definitely Leave (evacuate) Definitivamente salir (evacuar)

Levels.1: Definitely Stay at Home  Definitivamente quedarme en casa
Levels.2: Probably Stay at Home  Probablemente quedarme en casa
Levels.4: Probably Leave (evacuate)  Probablemente salir (evacuar)

irma_hurtep_d1___1.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (1, in my home  en mi casa) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d1___2.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (2, in a closet,  bathroom,  or hallway  en un armario,  baño o pasillo) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d1___3.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (3, in a friend's or relative's home  en el hogar de un amigo o pariente) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d1___4.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (4, in a shelter  en un refugio) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d1___5.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (5, out of town  fuera de la ciudad) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d1___6.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (6, in a car  en un auto) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d1___7.Description: Where was your child during the Hurricane? (you can check more than one) Donde estaba su hijo(a) durante el huracán? (puedes verificar más de uno) (7, other Otro) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

irma_hurtep_d2.Description: Did windows or doors break in the place your child stayed during the hurricane? ¿Se rompieron ventanas o puertas en el lugar donde se quedA durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d3.Description: Was there any flooding or water damage in the place your child stayed in during the hurricane? ¿Hubo alguna inundaciAn o daño por agua en el lugar donde se quedA durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d4.Description: Did your child get hurt during the hurricane? ¿Su hijo(a) se lastimasto durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d5.Description: At any time during the hurricane, did you think you might die? En cualquier momento durante el huracán, ¿pensaste que podrías morir? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d6.Description: Did your child see anyone else get hurt badly during the hurricane? ¿Tu hijo(a) vio a otra persona lastimarse mal durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d7.Description: Did your child have to go outside during the hurricane because the building you were in was damaged? ¿Tu hijo(a) tuvo que salir afuera durante el huracán porque el edificio donde estabas fue dañado? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d8.Description: Did a pet your child liked get hurt or die during the hurricane? ¿Se lastimA o muriA una mascota que le gustaba a su hijo(a) durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d9.Description: Did your child get hit by anything falling or flying during the hurricane? ¿Fue su hijo(a) golpeado por algo cayendo o volando durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d10.Description: Was a close family member with your child during the hurricane? Was a close family member with your child during the hurricane? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d11.Description: Did you think a family member might die during the hurricane? ¿Pensaste que un miembro de la familia podría morir durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d12.Description: Did you think you might be hurt badly during the hurricane? ¿Pensaste que podrías herirse gravemente durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_d13.Description: Did you think a family member might be hurt badly during the hurricane? ¿Pensaste que un miembro de la familia podría herirse gravemente durante el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

Durante el hurracan, ¿pensaste que el huracán estaba causando daños importantes a su hogar, o que podrías perder su hogar? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a1.Description: Was your home damaged badly or destroyed by the hurricane? ¿Su hogar sufriA daños graves o fue destruido por el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a2.Description: Did you have any changes at work or school because of the hurricane? ¿Tuvo algún cambio en el trabajo o la escuela debido al huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a3.Description: Did you move to a new place because of the hurricane? ¿Te mudaste a un lugar nuevo debido al huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a4.Description: Did you or a close family member lose a job because of the hurricane? ¿PerdiA usted o un miembro de su familia su trabajo debido al huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a5.Description: Has it been hard to see your friends since the hurricane? ¿Ha sido difícil ver a tus amigos o familiares desde el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a6.Description: Did you or your family have trouble getting enough food and water after the hurricane? ¿Usted o su familia tuvieron problemas para obtener suficiente comida y agua después del huracán | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a7.Description: Were your clothes or belongings ruined by the hurricane? ¿Su ropa o pertenencias fueron arruinadas por el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a8.Description: Did your pet run away or have to be given away because of the hurricane? ¿Se escapA su mascota o tuvo que ser entregada debido al huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a9.Description: Has anyone stolen anything from your home since the hurricane? ¿Alguien ha robado algo de su casa desde el huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a10.Description: Did you have to live away from close family members for a week or more because of the hurricane? ¿Tuvo que vivir alejado de familiares cercanos durante una semana o más debido al huracán? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a11.Description: Were you without power or water for a week or more?  ¿Estabas sin energía o agua durante una semana o más? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a12.Description: Did you have to travel a lot longer to get to work or school? ¿Tuvo que viajar mucho más tiempo para ir al trabajo o a la escuela? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a13.Description: Did you lose internet for a week or more? ¿PerdiA Internet por una semana o más? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

irma_hurtep_a14.Description: Has there been lots of damage in your neighborhood, such as large unearthed trees or badly damaged homes? ¿Hubo mucho daño en su vecindario, como grandes árboles sin segar o casas gravemente dañadas? | 1 = Yes  Si; 0 = No No

Levels.4: Very Often4 Muchisimo a menudo4

irma_pssp_6.Description: 6. In the last month, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do? 6. En el último mes, ¿con qué frecuencia descubriA que no podía enfrentarse a todas las cosas que tenía que hacer? | 0 = Never0  Nunca0; 1 = Almost Never1  Casi nunca1; 2 = Sometimes2  A veces2; 3 = Fairly Often3  Bastante a menudo3; 4 = Very Often4 Muchisimo a menudo4

Levels.4: Very Often4 Muchisimo a menudo4

irma_pssp_7.Description: 7. In the last month, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life? 7. En el último mes, ¿con qué frecuencia ha podido controlar las irritaciones en su vida? | 0 = Never0  Nunca0; 1 = Almost Never1  Casi nunca1; 2 = Sometimes2  A veces2; 3 = Fairly Often3  Bastante a menudo3; 4 = Very Often4 Muchisimo a menudo4

irma_pssp_8.Description: 8. In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things? 8. irma_pssp_9.Description: 9. In the last month, how often have you been angered because of things that happened that were outside of your control? 9. Levels.4: Very Often4 Muchisimo a menudo4

irma_pssp_10.Description: 10. In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them? 10.
